name: Sandymount Hotel

reviews.title: Good value
reviews.text: 12 family members stayed at the Mount Herbert last weekend for my father-in-laws 70th Birthday.

reviews.title: Nice stay, very pleasant
reviews.text: Negatives were the rooms were very dated and we were on the bottom floor and found our bathroom had a upleasant odour with no extractor fan working. We have a one year old, the cots were travel cots and could really do with replacing with new ones.

description: This family-run hotel is located next to Dublin’s Aviva Stadium with Free Wi-Fi, private gardens and free secure parking. The RDS convention centre is a 5 minute walk away, and Dublin’s centre is just a few minutes away by DART / Rail.Each stylish room at Sandymount Hotel features an en suite bathroom and a hairdryer. Rooms also include a flat-screen TV, modern artwork and designer bed throws.Full Irish breakfasts are served at Cordyline Restaurant,overlooking the hotel gardens. The bright and modern Tritonville Bar & Terrace offers informal dining and an outdoor seating area with a view of the private, landscaped gardens.Guests can enjoy free access to the hotel's business centre, which includes Wi-Fi and printing facilities. Private alcove areas and the light-filled Sun Lounge, where guests can relax and are accessible free of charge.The O2 Arena is less than a 5-minute drive from the hotel, while the DART rail link to the city centre is just a 1-minute walk away. The Bord Gáis Energy Theatre is 1 stop away by DART rail, and the city centre is just 2 stops away.
